failure.message: The following asserts failed: Actual city details and Expected city details are not same expected [Almeria (LEI) - Barcelona (BCN)] but found [Almería (LEI) - Barcelona (BCN)], Actual Journy dates and Expected Journey dates are not same expected [13/7/2017 - 20/7/2017] but found [13/07/2017 - 20/07/2017], Actual Passenger details and Expected Passenger details are not same expected [2 Adults, 2 Children, 2 Babies] but found [2 Adultos, 2 Niños, 2 Bebés]
